LuaScript:
function onLoad()

end



function onUpdate ()

end


function distribute(numeroCartas)
    deck = getDeck("344f75")
    if pcall(checkDeckQuantity,deck,numeroCartas[1]) then

    else
        recoverDiscards(deck,numeroCartas[1])
    end

end


function getDeck(ID)
    deckArea = getObjectFromGUID(ID)
    deck = deckArea.getObjects()
    return deck[1]
end


function checkDeckQuantity(deck,numeroCartas)

    if unexpected_condition then error() end
    count = 0

    for k,card in ipairs(deck.getObjects()) do
        count = count+1
    end

    if numeroCartas > count then
        recoverDiscards(deck,numeroCartas)
    else
        dealHand(deck,numeroCartas)
    end



end

function recoverDiscards(deck,numeroCartas)
    deckPosition = deck.getPosition()
    discards = getDeck("73430b")
    discards.flip()
    discards.randomize()
    discards.setPosition(deckPosition)
    deckPosition.y = 10
    deck.setPosition(deckPosition)
    --newDeck = getDeck("110203")
    --dealHand(newDeck,numeroCartas)

end


function dealHand(deck,numeroCartas)
    if unexpected_condition then error() end
    targetPos, targetRot = deck.getPosition(), deck.getRotation()
    targetPos.y = 3
    targetPos.x = targetPos.x + 8
    for i=1, numeroCartas do
        deck.takeObject({index = 0, position = targetPos, rotation = targetRot, flip=true})
        targetPos.x = targetPos.x + 6
    end

end


function distribute2(numeroCartas)
    deck = getDeck("90b48b")
    if pcall(checkDeckQuantity2,deck,numeroCartas[1]) then

    else
        recoverDiscards(deck,numeroCartas[1])
    end

end


function checkDeckQuantity2(deck,numeroCartas)

    if unexpected_condition then error() end
    count = 0

    for k,card in ipairs(deck.getObjects()) do
        count = count+1
    end

    if numeroCartas > count then
        recoverDiscards2(deck,numeroCartas)
    else
        dealHand2(deck,numeroCartas)
    end

end


function recoverDiscards2(deck,numeroCartas)
    deckPosition = deck.getPosition()
    discards = getDeck("52b37f")
    discards.flip()
    discards.randomize()
    discards.setPosition(deckPosition)
    deckPosition.y = 10
    deck.setPosition(deckPosition)

    --newDeck2 = getDeck("110203")
    --dealHand2(newDeck2,numeroCartas)

end


function dealHand2(deck,numeroCartas)

    targetPos, targetRot = deck.getPosition(), deck.getRotation()
    targetPos.y = 3
    targetPos.x = targetPos.x - 8

    for i=1, numeroCartas do
        deck.takeObject({index = 0, position = targetPos, rotation = targetRot,flip=true})
        targetPos.x = targetPos.x - 6
    end

end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
    self.createButton({
      label="", click_function="repairMarket", function_owner=self,
      position={0,0,0}, height=325, width=325, font_size=0, rotation={0,0,0}
    })
end

function repairMarket()
    marketDeck = getDeck("964ce4")
    marketDeckPosition = marketDeck.getPosition()
    card1 = getDeck("1fa492")
    card2 = getDeck("7b55e1")
    card3 = getDeck("57473f")
    card4 = getDeck("f74dfe")
    card5 = getDeck("a61b5b")

    if card1 == nil then
        marketDeckPosition.x = -14
        marketDeck.takeObject({index = 0, position = marketDeckPosition, flip=true})
    end

    if card2 == nil then
        marketDeckPosition.x = -8
        marketDeck.takeObject({index = 0, position = marketDeckPosition, flip=true})
    end

    if card3 == nil then
        marketDeckPosition.x = -2
        marketDeck.takeObject({index = 0, position = marketDeckPosition, flip=true})
    end

    if card4 == nil then
        marketDeckPosition.x = 4
        marketDeck.takeObject({index = 0, position = marketDeckPosition, flip=true})
    end

    if card5 == nil then
        marketDeckPosition.x = 10
        marketDeck.takeObject({index = 0, position = marketDeckPosition, flip=true})
    end

end

function getDeck(ID)
    deckArea = getObjectFromGUID(ID)
    deck = deckArea.getObjects()
    return deck[1]
end
